nodes.text: Starbird Squadron was a starfighter squadron of the New Republic. Starbird Squadron, of which were General Hera Syndulla's latest ships, were inspired by Sabine Wren's legendary art.
Starbird Squadron's starfighters were marked with an orange Wren Phoenix crest.

The colors of Starbird Squadron are one of the customizable cosmetic options present within the 2020 video game Star Wars: Squadrons, in which their colors can be applied to the ships of Vanguard Squadron.
